thread.title: What About the Positive Benefits of Climate Change?

author: wsjcom
title: What About the Positive Benefits of Climate Change?
text:
Regarding Phelim McAleer’s “Climate Alarmists May Inherit the Wind” (op-ed, April 2): A sure sign climate alarmists are attempting to stampede public opinion is the complete absence from their narrative of even a single benefit that might ensue from a warmer planet. Yet there are many. One, for example, is the prospect that all those blue state retirees who now populate my native state of Florida turning it to a pallid purple may decamp to a newly balmy climate like, say, Minnesota, thus restoring the state to its once radiant red.
...
